```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
```

# Load data

```{r}
load("prepared-data/human-div.rda")
```

# Richness

```{r}
human.div$spec.counts %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = BMI, y = n)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point() +
  labs(y = "Number of species") +
  theme_bw()
ggsave("../../figures/boxplot_species-richness-Hs-16s.png")
```

# Diversity


```{r}
human.div$div.calc %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = BMI, y = `.`)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point() +
  labs(y = "Simpson's diversity") +
  theme_bw()
ggsave("../../figures/boxplot_simpsons-Hs-16s.png")
```

# KW tests

```{r}
kruskal.test(human.div$div.calc$. ~ human.div$div.calc$BMI)
kruskal.test(human.div$spec.counts$n ~ human.div$spec.counts$BMI)
```
